questions.question: Considering the overall visual presentation, what single word best describes the predominant color of the product shown in the image?
Based on the image, what is the most apparent type of text displayed on the product?

If you were to describe the shape of the area shown in the image, which single word comes to mind?

What is the single-word description that best captures the visual clarity or sharpness of the text on the product?
Considering the image, what is the most visually apparent secondary ingredient listed on the product?
Based on the visual evidence from the image, what is the most prominent visual element shown on the product?
What single word best captures the visual form or design style of the product shown in the image?
What single word best describes the visual state or appearance of the product labeling?

What is the most noticeable visual feature that is present on the product's visible area?
